General.Name: Becamex Infrastructure Development JSC
General.Description: Becamex Infrastructure Development Joint Stock Company engages in real estate business in Vietnam. It is also involved in provision of toll collection, construction, investment real estate, restaurant and hotel, grocery, and supermarket goods and services related businesses, as well as business cooperation projects. Becamex Infrastructure Development Joint Stock Company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Thu Dau Mot, Vietnam.
